languages.text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.
languages.original_text: Известные также как Сестры битвы и Дочери Императора, они считают, что их вера — оружие мощнее стали. Бесстрашно бросаясь в бой с молитвой Императору на устах, Адепта Сороритас разят своих врагов болтерами и огнеметами.

traits.locale_text: Known also as the Sisters of Battle and Daughters of the Emperor, they believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. Adepta Sororitas strike their foes down with boltguns and flamers, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

Known also as the Sisters of Battle and Daughters of the Emperor, they believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. Adepta Sororitas strike their foes down with boltguns and flamers, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

languages.text: Известные также как Сестры битвы и Дочери Императора, они считают, что их вера — оружие мощнее стали. Бесстрашно бросаясь в бой с молитвой Императору на устах, Адепта Сороритас разят своих врагов болтерами и огнеметами.

Die Kriegerinnen der Adepta Sororitas, auch bekannt als die Schwestern der Schlacht, glauben fest daran, dass ihr Glaube eine Waffe ist, die viel stärker ist als jeder Stahl. Sie schlagen ihre Feinde mit der heiligen Dreifaltigkeit von Bolter, Flamme und Melta nieder, stürmen furchtlos in die Schlacht, singen Lobeshymnen und rufen den Imperator um Hilfe an.
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

traits.locale_text: Die Kriegerinnen der Adepta Sororitas, auch bekannt als die Schwestern der Schlacht, glauben fest daran, dass ihr Glaube eine Waffe ist, die viel stärker ist als jeder Stahl. Sie schlagen ihre Feinde mit der heiligen Dreifaltigkeit von Bolter, Flamme und Melta nieder, stürmen furchtlos in die Schlacht, singen Lobeshymnen und rufen den Imperator um Hilfe an.

languages.text: Également surnommées Sœurs de Bataille, les guerrières de l'Adepta Sororitas estiment que leur foi est une arme bien plus puissante que n'importe quel acier. Elles frappent leurs ennemis avec la sainte trinité du bolter, du lance-flammes et de la fusion, se lançant sans peur dans la bataille, chantant des hymnes de louange et appelant l'Empereur à les aider.
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

traits.locale_text: Également connues sous le nom de Sœurs de Bataille, les guerrières de l'Adepta Sororitas croient que leur foi est une arme bien plus puissante que n'importe quel acier. Elles frappent leurs ennemis avec la sainte trinité du bolter, du lance-flammes et de la fusion, se lançant sans peur dans la bataille, chantant des hymnes de louange et appelant l'Empereur à les aider.

languages.text: 修女会的成员被称为战斗修女，对这些忠贞不渝的战士而言，信仰这种武器比任何钢铁都要更加强大。她们会通过圣三位一体——爆矢枪、火焰喷射器与热熔武器来打击敌人。她们会毫不畏惧地大步迈进战场，口中高唱着赞美诗，呼唤帝皇的援助。
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

traits.locale_text: 修女会的成员被称为战斗修女，对这些忠贞不渝的战士而言，信仰这种武器比任何钢铁都要更加强大。她们会通过圣三位一体——爆矢枪、火焰喷射器与热熔武器来打击敌人。她们会毫不畏惧地大步迈进战场，口中高唱着赞美诗，呼唤帝皇的援助。

languages.text: 戦闘修道女としても知られる修道聖女会の戦士たちは、自分たちの信仰がどんな鋼鉄よりもはるかに強い武器であると信じている。ボルター、フレイマー、メルタの聖なる三位一体で敵を打ちのめし、讃美歌を唱え、皇帝にご加護を求めながら、恐れを知らぬまま戦いに赴く。
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘修道女（シスター・オヴ・バトル）としても知られる修道聖女会（アデプタ・ソロリタス）の戦士たちは、自分たちの信仰がどんな鋼鉄よりもはるかに強い武器であると信じている。ボルター、フレイマー、メルタの聖なる三位一体で敵を打ちのめし、讃美歌を唱え、皇帝にご加護を求めながら、恐れを知らぬまま戦いに赴く。

languages.text: Las guerreras de la Adepta Sororitas, también conocidas como las Hermanas de Batalla, creen que su fe es más poderosa que cualquier acero. Abaten a sus enemigos con la santísima trinidad que conforman el bólter, el lanzallamas y la fusión, abalanzándose sin miedo al combate y entonando himnos de alabanza al Emperador para que las ayude.
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.

traits.locale_text: Las guerreras de la Adepta Sororitas, también conocidas como las Hermanas de Batalla, creen que su fe es más poderosa que cualquier acero. Abaten a sus enemigos con la santísima trinidad que conforman el bólter, el lanzallamas y la fusión, abalanzándose sin miedo al combate y entonando himnos de alabanza al Emperador para que las ayude.

languages.text: Adepta Sororitas'ın Harp Rahibesi olarak da bilinen savaşçıları, imanlarının her türlü çelikten daha kudretli bir silah olduğuna inanırlar. Düşmanlarına bulonatar, alevsaçan ve meltanın kutsal üçlüsüyle saldırır; muharebeye korkusuzca dalar; övgü ilahileri söyleyip İmparator'dan yardım isterler.
languages.original_text: Also known as the Sisters of Battle, the warriors of the Adepta Sororitas believe their faith to be a weapon far stronger than any steel. They strike their foes down with the holy trinity of bolter, flamer, and melta, fearlessly striding into battle, chanting hymns of praise and calling upon the Emperor to aid them.
